name: TPL_SCHED_DEFAULTS
description: This table maps visit kinds to a provider and department to be used as the default when requesting a visit of that kind.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment plan.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCHED_RES_VST_KND_C_NAME
columns.description: The visit kind category number to which the default provider and department are mapped.

columns.name: SCHED_RES_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the default provider to use when scheduling visits of this kind.

columns.name: SCHED_RES_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the default department to use when scheduling visits of this kind.
